thread.title: What is going on?! The moment Matt Damon, Meryl Streep and The Rock realise La La Land gaffe - as Jimmy Kimmel sprints on stage
thread.title_full: What is going on?! The moment Matt Damon, Meryl Streep and The Rock realise La La Land gaffe - as Jimmy Kimmel sprints on stage

author: Barney Henderson
title: What is going on?! The moment Matt Damon, Meryl Streep and The Rock realise La La Land gaffe - as Jimmy Kimmel sprints on stage
text:
W hat just happened?!
Two dramatic images show the moment a host of A-list stars realise La La land has been awarded the best picture Oscar by mistake.
In the first image, Jimmy Kimmel can be seen sitting in the chair vacated by Matt Damon's wife as it is first announced there has been a dreadful mix up:
Audience reacts to "Moonlight" being announced as best picture winner Credit: AP The host sprints onto the stage to try and sort out the mess - as A-listers including Mel Gibson, Michelle Williams, Matt Damon, Salma Hayek, The Rock, Meryle Streep and others look on in horror:
The stunned audience after Best Picture "La La Land" was discovered to have been read by mistake Credit: Polaris / eyevine
